Generally **Turbo** is pretty good on Auto due to the fact that when you play it, it can help you to create and play a Function resulting in an absurd burst potential, and drawing a **Void** doesn't really matter in the second shuffle, as you already created a majority of your Functions.
Also you if you have <burn out> or the other two status exhausting cards you don't even have to pay back its cost in draw or energy

messages.content:
just a minor thing about Defect's Turbo:
They can Hologram the void to exhaust it without it stealing an energy
Oh, that's cool
i fucking love turbo pyramid
Yeah it feels best on the first deck cycle, but on 2nd onward it feels a lot less useful, I think it would really benefit from some sort of exhaust

Turbo is a pretty functional energy card for automaton, but you do need to make sure you have the right reasons before adding it to your deck. Runic Pyramid definitely helps you find a use for all the energy, you can play robo chop, max output, and goto to hopefully lineup card draw with the energy gain. It can also be helpful if you want to deploy more expensive cards and powers, like summon orb, sentient form, library, boost and fortify. It becomes more useful if you miss the 4th energy from the act 1 boss relic as well. It can also be a functional part of a deck with mutator, repulsor, it's a feature, or the green cube relic that gives you a stack of evolve. I do think it's fair to say that defect uses this card better, because they have a lot of card draw and really strong/expensive powers to use the energy for. You won't take automaton turbo every run, but be on the lookout for synergies, and recognize when your deck is struggling with energy problems, because it definitely has it's moments
